Presentation Title
How Start-Ups can make the Most Efficient Use of its Available Resources
- The White Ocean Strategy -

Presentation Details
It has only been 3 years since Mr. Makoto Yagi has established the reunion party planning company named Syoya Inc., and he already has a proven track record of hosting 300 reunion parties a year through his business, which is the highest number in the industry. He founded his company when he was 25 years old with another partner and in 2012 he has managed to expand his business to up to 15 company partnerships. In what was first an un-defined market, Mr. Yagi was able to generate revenue from his own business model, form partnerships with several companies and successfully expand his business. During the seminar, he will be presenting on how he successfully changed a business that generates revenue from labour into a business that generates stable revenue from available assets.

Speaker Profile
Mr. Yagi is a young entrepreneur of only 28 years of age who took on the challenge of attempting the one and only business model in Japan. He has shown great ability in several areas such as human resources, PR and management through his reunion party planning business named Syoya Inc. and also through running Japan's first made-to-order cereal online purchasing website. The reunion party planning business he created has a unique concept of having a sponsor for the reunion party. This has lead to forming a lot of partnerships through this business. On a personal basis, he has been planning and managing programming contests for students and has also been taking part in a wide variety of activities such as recruitment consulting and providing job search support regional universities.

Articles.PageTitle: Servcorp Japan Launches Walk-in Check-in Promotion - News | Servcorp
Articles.MetaKeyword: Servcorp Japan Launches Walk-in Check-in Promotion,News, Servcorp

Articles.Title: Servcorp Japan Launches Walk-in Check-in Promotion!
Articles.Author: Servcorp
Articles.Summary: Servcorp, the leading provider of high quality Serviced and Virtual Offices worldwide, has launched a Facebook Check-In promotion in Japan during the month of June 2012.
Articles.A_Title: SERVCORP JAPAN LAUNCHES WALK-IN CHECK-IN PROMOTION!
Articles.A_Content:
Servcorp, the leading provider of high quality Serviced and Virtual Offices worldwide, has launched a Facebook Check-In promotion in Japan during the month of June 2012.

Anyone who “Likes” Servcorp Japan's Facebook page and checks in to any Servcorp location in Tokyo, Yokohama, Nagoya, Osaka and Fukuoka will enjoy a complimentary 3-Hour usage of Servcorp's first class Business Lounge.

Promotion Summary

Duration:From June 4th to June 29th, 2012
Venues:All Servcorp locations in Tokyo, Yokohama, Nagoya, Osaka and Fukuoka.

In this promotion, any visitor who “Likes” Servcorp Japan's Facebook Page (http://www.facebook.com/ServcorpJapan) and checks in to any Servcorp location in Japan will be able to use Servcorp's Business Lounge for 3 hours* for free. Visitors can also enjoy free Wi-Fi and complimentary beverages such as coffee and tea during their stay at the Business Lounge.

Furthermore, all visitors have a chance to win a 5,000yen iTunes gift card if they complete a questionnaire. The iTunes gift card will be given out to 5 winners through a lucky draw.

*Existing Servcorp Virtual Office clients will get free 2 hours in addition to the available usage included in their packages.
*We do not accept prior reservations of the Business Lounge. Please simply visit our location and then check in on Facebook.
*Check-In Deals will be issued only once at each location per person. If you check in to a different location, a new Check-In Deal will be issued.
*If you leave before spending 3 hours at your visit, you cannot carry over the remaining time for use later.

How It Works

Reference: http://www.facebook.com/deals/checkin/

Step 1
“Like” the Servcorp Japan Facebook Page (http://www.facebook.com/ServcorpJapan).

Step 2
When you arrive at a Servcorp location, please log in to Facebook on your smart phone.
Tap ‘Check-In' from your Timeline.

Step 3
Tap on the Servcorp location you are currently visiting from the list showing your nearest Places (If you can't find it, search ‘Servcorp').

Step 4
Post your Check-In onto your Timeline, tap the Place on your post, and tap ‘Claim Deal.'

To redeem, simply show the Deal screen to Servcorp's reception.

Servcorp Business Lounge

Servcorp provides Serviced and Virtual Offices in 21 countries worldwide and in 21 locations in Japan including Tokyo, Yokohama, Nagoya, Osaka and Fukuoka. Each location is within walking distance from the train stations and has a Business Lounge which offers workspaces best suited for active business persons who require a private working atmosphere.

In the Servcorp Business Lounge, you can enjoy a wide private desk, a comfortable leather executive chair and high-speed Wi-Fi. Stationery goods are also available, providing you with a convenient and high quality work environment. Servcorp offers the same consistent first-class business infrastructures all over the world which is loved by travelling business persons.

This is a great opportunity to try out Servcorp's world class, IT equipped Business Lounge for free! We look forward to welcoming you at each Servcorp Japan location!

Articles.Summary: Servcorp Business Shorts was held at Shiroyama Trust Tower on Thursday, May 24th.
Articles.A_Title: Servcorp Business Shorts at Shiroyama Trust Tower
Articles.A_Content:
Afterword

We were pleased to have 45 participants from a wide variety of industries from IT, consulting to art industries attend our Business Shorts. Participants said that they have enjoyed the presentation, because it has allowed them to discover something new about themselves that they have never been aware of. We were very pleased to have many people attend the event this time as well.

 

Upcoming: Servcorp Business Shorts at Shiroyama Trust Tower on Thursday, May 24th.

Servcorp Business Shorts is a monthly event in which we invite a guest speaker and professionals who are willing to share their experience with like-minded business professionals. This seminar also gives you the opportunity to see a Servcorp floor. If you know people who are interested in this event as well as serviced office/virtual office, please extend our invitation to them!

Presentation Details

From my 15 years of experience as a corporate training instructor, I have come to realize how much people are immersed in the corporate organizational structure.　In our current society, only a handful can clearly express “who they are, what they can do and what they can contribute” – in other words, the ability to explain the characteristics of their “brand.”　Thus, over the past 3 years, mainly on the web, I have presented and educated people on “Human Branding®.”　In order to survive this era, people who work need to realize their “brand” value. I believe that people who cannot brand themselves will eventually be removed from the workforce. During my presentation, I will explain how to “brand” people, a procedure that is different from building a corporate brand. If you have any interest in Human Branding® methods, please attend the seminar. I look forward to meeting you!

Speaker Profile

Mr. Shuichi Noguchi majored in International Relations, and upon graduating university, he joined an airline company mainly in charge of traveler services, sales and promotion and taking the lead in a project introducing a new airplane model to the company.

Since then, he has come to an important realization that in the future, to operate a company, organizations require human resources that are capable of contributing to a drastic reform in management.

To change careers, he joined a venture company specializing in human resources development, working on human resources development based on teaching methods from Harvard Business School's MBA program.

He currently teaches and provides consulting services on “Human Branding®,” a concept he derived from his extensive experience as a corporate training instructor.

In July 2011, he has published a book titled “Seven Anti-Common Senses of Top Business Person.”

Articles.Author: Servcorp
Articles.Summary: On Thursday, April 12th, Servcorp co-hosted an evening seminar event with Bloomberg L.P., which was held in the conference room at Bloomberg.
Articles.A_Title: Bloomberg x Servcorp Seminar Event
Articles.A_Content:
On Thursday, April 12th, Servcorp co-hosted an evening seminar event with Bloomberg L.P., which was held in the conference room at Bloomberg.
Servcorp and Bloomberg's clients, mainly in the finance industry, were invited to this event and we were pleased to have over 40 people attend that night.

The speaker for the seminar was Mr. William Pesek, Asia Columnist, Bloomberg News. His presentation focused on "A year after Japan's record earthquake and tsunami, investors are at a crossroads," introducing his views on Japan's economic upturns and how investors can grab opportunities.

After the seminar, the attendees and staff from Bloomberg and Servcorp enjoyed a cocktail party where everyone had the opportunity to network and enjoy the rest of the night.

Speaker:
William Pesek, Asia Columnist, Bloomberg News

Topic:
Risks and Opportunities in Land of Rising Yen

Bloomberg website:
http://www.bloomberg.com

Articles.NodeName: servcorp-wins-innovation-in-export-award
Articles.PageName: Servcorp wins innovation in Export Award at 2011 Premier’s NSW Export Award
Articles.PageTitle: Servcorp wins innovation in Export Award at 2011 Premier’s NSW Export Award - News | Servcorp
Articles.MetaKeyword: Servcorp wins innovation in Export Award at 2011 Premier’s NSW Export Award,News, Servcorp
Articles.MetaDescription: Servcorp wins innovation in Export Award at 2011 Premier’s NSW Export Award - Servcorp News
Articles.Title: Servcorp wins innovation in Export Award at 2011 Premier's NSW Export Award
Articles.Author: Servcorp
Articles.Summary: Servcorp won the Innovation in Export Award at the NSW Premier's Export Awards last night at the Le Montage, Leichhardt.
Articles.A_Title: Servcorp wins innovation in Export Award at 2011 Premier's NSW Export Award
Articles.A_Content:
Sydney, October 21 2011 - Servcorp won the Innovation in Export Award at the NSW Premier's Export Awards last night at the Le Montage, Leichhardt. The award tops off the biggest expansion year in Servcorp's history and was achieved whilst simultaneously recording strong profit growth.

In the 2010-11 financial year Servcorp increased its full-year mature-floor net profit before tax by 24 per cent, added 10 new cities to their offerings, added 39 new ‘floors' to their buildings (from just 77 to 116) and entered the challenging US space whilst continuing to succeed in Europe, the Middle East, Asia and China.

The Innovation in Export Award is given to the business that demonstrates the strongest commitment to innovation in global exporting, including the viability of the company, marketing strategy and competitive edge of product/service in marketplace. Servcorp won against Australian Pictorials, eMite, EverX and LeadBolt.

Sustainability was the theme of the 2011 awards. The resource minimising Virtual Office product and the Green Office project are Servcorp's key sustainability focuses. The Virtual Office product involves minimum incremental investment and overheads as it leverages off the existing infrastructure required for the Serviced Office business.

“We are delighted to be the recipients of the Innovation in Export Award for NSW. It is a great testament to the dedication and hard work of our staff from around the world, especially our 250 strong staff in the US, Japan and the Middle East which are our three biggest services export market” said Servcorp's Executive Director Taine Moufarrige.

Moufarrige said Servcorp continues to establish an enviable record in Australia, with export growth occurring in more recent times. He views it as a privilege to be recognized amongst household names as a growing Australian brand pioneering the way for global business and export.

Servcorp are passionate about enabling companies of any size to export their products and services to new markets in over 100 locations around the world by providing them with the infrastructure, support and presence of a multi-national organisation without the financial investment or risk.

“We're proud of the fact that we make opening a business in a new market really easy and it's great (although not necessary) to receive this recognition”, said Mr. Moufarrige.

Articles.Title: Evacuation Solutions for Businesses in Japan Following the March 11 Northern Japan Earthquake, Tsunami and Nuclear Crisis - Servcorp Featured in Various Media
Articles.Author: Servcorp
Articles.Summary: To those who are suffering from the Northern Japan Earthquake that took place on March 11, our thoughts are with you.
Articles.A_Title: Evacuation Solutions for Businesses in Japan Following the March 11 Northern Japan Earthquake, Tsunami and Nuclear Crisis – Servcorp Featured in Various Media
Articles.A_Content:
To those who are suffering from the Northern Japan Earthquake that took place on March 11, our thoughts are with you.

Shortly after the earthquake, with the ongoing aftershocks and the developing nuclear crisis, Servcorp saw its Osaka, Nagoya and Fukuoka locations flooded with enquiries for short term and medium term relocation of the offices of many major corporations located in Tokyo. Servcorp was able to provide those companies instant office evacuation solutions ensuring their business remained uninterrupted. Japan being an earthquake prone country, some companies now wish to permanently diversify risk and keep separate serviced office space outside their Head Office city to ensure continuity of their business in case of a future disaster or future power outages.

Servcorp received extensive media coverage on providing such solutions to many Japanese corporations who temporarily “fled” the Tokyo area.

Articles.NodeName: Off the beaten track ... Taine Moufarrige walks the Simpson Desert
Articles.PageTitle: Taine Moufarrige walks the Simpson Desert - News | Servcorp
Articles.MetaKeyword: Taine Moufarrige walks the Simpson Desert,News, Sercorp
Articles.MetaDescription: Taine Moufarrige walks the Simpson Desert - Servcorp News
Articles.Title: Off the beaten track ... Taine Moufarrige walks the Simpson Desert
Articles.Author: Source: Sydney Morning Herald
Articles.Summary: The executive director of the listed serviced office company Servcorp, Taine Moufarrige, will miss the comforts of his computer screen over the next two weeks as he treks across one of the country's less hospitable spots the Simpson Desert
Articles.A_Title: Off the beaten track ... Taine Moufarrige walks the Simpson Desert
Articles.A_Content:
The executive director of the listed serviced office company Servcorp, Taine Moufarrige, will miss the comforts of his computer screen over the next two weeks as he treks across one of the country's less hospitable spots the Simpson Desert.

Yesterday Moufarrige set off from the eastern edge of the desert on a 320-kilometre journey with two dozen other trekkers who have so far raised $1 million for a charity that raises awareness about young people with high care needs. Other trekkers in the inaugural Youngcare Simpson Desert Challenge include Rothschild Australia's chief operating officer, James Hamilton, property developer Nic De Luca, and the chief executive of Youngcare, Marina Vit.

The highest fund-raiser in the expedition is the chief executive of the Mentos and Fisherman's Friend distributor Stuart Alexander, Garry Browne. He has already raised about $109,000.

Moufarrige and his fellow adventurers, however, will have one big advantage to other well-known explorers of the Australian interior such as Burke and Wills. They will be resupplied every 24 hours along the route, which crosses about a thousand sand dunes. At the end of the journey they will also be well supplied at the desert's best-known landmark - the Birdsville Hotel.

Articles.NodeName: Running a Business has Never been This Easy
Articles.PageTitle: Running a Business has Never been This Easy - News | Servcorp
Articles.MetaKeyword: Running a Business has Never been This Easy,News, Servcorp
Articles.MetaDescription: Running a Business has Never been This Easy - Servcorp News
Articles.Title: Running a Business has Never been This Easy
Articles.Author: Servcorp
Articles.Summary: Today's fast paced and highly competitive business environment has increased the pressure on businesses to succeed in a tough marketplace. Business owners need a solution which removes the hassles of the day-to-day running of an office so they can focus on increasing their bottom line and succeeding in any market. An ideal office solution is an important factor that will help them focus solely on their business goals while having a professional presence they deserve.
Articles.A_Title: Running a Business has Never been This Easy
Articles.A_Content: Today's fast paced and highly competitive business environment has increased the pressure on businesses to succeed in a tough marketplace. Business owners need a solution which removes the hassles of the day-to-day running of an office so they can focus on increasing their bottom line and succeeding in any market. An ideal office solution is an important factor that will help them focus solely on their business goals while having a professional presence they deserve. The effort of having to source the right office in the right location and dealing with exorbitant rental fees, set-up costs, furniture and IT set up can be quite stressful on its own, and this is even before you consider hiring staff to run all this. It's not only the hassle of sourcing an office solution, but also the time spent on putting this in place. Having a Serviced or Virtual office provides the means to develop a business without having to fork out extensive overhead costs. With Servcorp businesses can sign up and are immediately equipped with an office, support team and IT available to support them when required. This can be for as short or long as needed without having to sign off on any long-term agreements. These office solutions can take away the stress, effort and expense of having to manage an office because it's already set up and ready to use. Serviced and Virtual Offices provide a unique suite of offerings that can be tailored to suit the needs of businesses and are designed to help companies increase sales while maintaining a work-life balance. Whether it is a receptionist who is the voice and face of the company or innovative IT technology solutions or meeting room facilities, the possibilities are broad and many. Or if the need for a global presence arises, businesses can reach any market with unprecedented ease and convenience. Servcorp can provide this for the cost of running a business locally. The accessibility of running a business online and having the technology to support this and a professional business presence is what can be the defining factor that helps a business stand out from the competition. Servcorp is a unique international organisation that provides Serviced and Virtual Offices and IT solutions to businesses across the globe. A proudly Australian owned company and the world's leading provider, offers over 120 locations in 22 countries throughout Australia and New Zealand, Asia, the USA, Europe and the Middle East—including eight premier locations in Sydney's CBD, Bondi Junction, North Sydney, Norwest Business Park, North Ryde and Parramatta. Servcorp caters to small to medium sized businesses, start-ups and multinational organisations. Servcorp provides the most flexible office rental and business solutions for growing businesses.

Articles.NodeName: Servcorp supports Japan Earthquake21
Articles.PageTitle: Servcorp supports Japan Earthquake - News | Servcorp
Articles.MetaKeyword: Servcorp supports Japan Earthquake,News, Servcorp
Articles.MetaDescription: Servcorp supports Japan Earthquake - Servcorp News
Articles.Title: Servcorp supports Japan Earthquake
Articles.Author: Servcorp
Articles.Summary: As you are all aware, on Friday 11 March 2011 Japan was hit by a devastating earthquake, tragically resulting in one of the worst natural disasters in recent times. We are sending our thoughts and condolences to all those affected by the recent tragic events. Thankfully, all of our team members have been accounted for in the wake of this disaster.
Articles.A_Title: Servcorp supports Japan Earthquake
Articles.A_Content:
As you are all aware, on Friday 11 March 2011 Japan was hit by a devastating earthquake, tragically resulting in one of the worst natural disasters in recent times. We are sending our thoughts and condolences to all those affected by the recent tragic events. Thankfully, all of our team members have been accounted for in the wake of this disaster.

Servcorp will be sending all support necessary to ensure the smoothest operations possible for our clients and team members, and will be establishing a fund to support victims throughout this difficult time.

A Message from Servcorp's CEO Alf Moufarrige:

Japan is my second home.

To see your beautiful country and its people terrified and to watch the Tsunami rip villages, cities and towns apart made me wish I was there to support you.

I pray for Japan and pledge that we here at Servcorp will remain firm supporters of your country.

All April initial rental payments from new sales across the globe will be donated to the Japanese Red Cross Society. I estimate this will total JPY10 million and I will personally add a further JPY2 million.

Money will not ease the suffering only the resolve and unity of the Japanese people will. I know their strength.

I look forward to returning to Tokyo and adding support to the healing process.

Articles.NodeName: Servcorp Operations for Week Commencing 14th March
Articles.PageTitle: Servcorp Operations for Week Commencing 14th March - News | Servcorp
Articles.MetaKeyword: Servcorp Operations for Week Commencing 14th March,News, Servcorp
Articles.MetaDescription: Servcorp Operations for Week Commencing 14th March - Servcorp News
Articles.Title: Servcorp Operations for Week Commencing 14th March
Articles.Author: Servcorp
Articles.Summary: Servcorp from all around the world sends out our thoughts and best wishes to Servcorp clients, and everyone suffering from the tragic events in Japan.
Articles.A_Title: Servcorp Operations for Week Commencing 14th March
Articles.A_Content:
Dear Servcorp Clients,

Servcorp from all around the world sends out our thoughts and best wishes to Servcorp clients, and everyone suffering from the tragic events in Japan.

Just an update on what is happening in Servcorp Japan; all team members in Japan are ok and we hope that you and your families are safe too.

Servcorp is committed to ensuring that your business can continue to operate as smoothly as possible during this difficult time. Most Servcorp team members are back to work.

Today Servcorp Japan will be closing at 2.30pm and we will be running on a lighter than usual staff for the remainder of this week. Our operation in Yokohama will be closed for half a day today due to scheduled power outages.

Should further aftershocks mean that we cannot man all the locations in Tokyo for extended periods of time, we have contingency plans in place, using Servcorp's global network to receive calls in Japanese, in other Servcorp locations around the world. Our aim is to maximize your up time during this very difficult period.

We will make sure you are informed however it is likely that business hours will be disrupted for the remainder of the week.

We would ask you at this time to please help to conserve electricity and turn off the lights in the corridors and your offices when not in use.

Servcorp hopes that you and your family stay safe in this time.

Regards,

The Servcorp Team

Articles.NodeName: How would data loss, communication issues and IT down time affect your business?
Articles.PageTitle: How would data loss, communication issues and IT down time
Articles.MetaKeyword: How would data loss, communication issues and IT down time affect your business?,News, Servcorp
Articles.MetaDescription: How would data loss, communication issues and IT down time affect your business? - Servcorp News
Articles.Title: How would data loss, communication issues and IT down time affect your business?
Articles.Author: Servcorp
Articles.Summary: Have you considered what would happen to your business if your IP provider went down, you lost all your files or your clients simply couldn't reach you by phone or email? Data loss, communication issues and IT down time could ultimately hurt your business and your profits.
Articles.A_Title: How would data loss, communication issues and IT down time affect your business?
Articles.A_Content:
Have you considered what would happen to your business if your IP provider went down, you lost all your files or your clients simply couldn't reach you by phone or email? Data loss, communication issues and IT down time could ultimately hurt your business and your profits.

The good news is that as a Servcorp client you don't have to think or even worry about it. We have invested US$50 million into our worldwide converged IP network to ensure it is delivered to you at a 99.99 per cent up time across the globe. We have made an ongoing commitment to you to provide the highest levels of voice and data connectivity. Basically, if it's within our means our system will be there to back you up.

Having a reliable robust technology platform with multiple redundancies backup is critical to ensuring you can run your business smoothly. It doesn't matter if you are in one of our office locations or accessing your Servcorp online account anywhere, anytime. Our new iPhone application just extends that flexibility and capability.

In early 2010, Servcorp's systems stood up to these claims when Thailand fell victim to political unrest which led to havoc along one of Bangkok's prime business districts.

The Servcorp building was on fire, and clients were instructed to leave the premises and stop working. The site was inaccessible to clients and the challenge was to keep clients businesses operational without onsite availability.

This problem was resolved utilizing Servcorp's communications infrastructure to remotely log onto the system and divert all the calls to our Singapore location. All the client calls were being answered as if the business was open for operation; which is due to our converged global network enabling the redirection of calls to another location, in this case Singapore. We also flew our receptionist there so that all client calls could be handled in Thai. Our Thai clients saw the benefit of being in operation while the rest of Bangkok was in disarray. Read full Press Release here

We are committed to continuing to provide you with the best technology on offer so that you are able to focus on your business, while we take care of the rest! As we continue to build advanced applications, our one-step-ahead approach is why the future looks so exciting.

Watch this space for the next developments that could benefit your business!

With now over 100 locations in 21 countries around the world, Servcorp can assist you with this growth by providing you with a boardroom, meeting room or premium office space in a new location at the click of a button!

You can easily book all the Servcorp services you have come to rely on using your Servcorp Online account or via our new‘Meetings' app available for free on your iPhone or iPad.

Available for download via iTunes, this application has a user friendly interface where bookings can be made in real time and in under a minute. This application which is the first of its kind, delivers the functionality of Servcorp's online booking application ‘Servcorp Online', directly to the iPhone, iPod and iPad providing you instant access to all our corporate addresses and meeting room facilities globally.

Servcorp now has presence, with two new locations now available the United Kingdom, in two of London's premier business and commercial hubs. Servcorp's presence at 40 Bank Street gives you easy entry in to the UK market, a sought after business address and access to major banks, financial institutions and law firms like Credit Suisse, HSBC, Citigroup and Thomson Reuters which are headquartered in Canary Wharf, London's new premier business hub.

Our second UK location, Dashwood House in London's Old Broad Street can provide you with premium office space, meeting rooms, boardrooms, IT and administrative support at Dashwood House and our new 40 Bank Street location, which is in the heart of Canary Wharf, the city's newest commercial and business estate.

As a Servcorp client, it's so much easier for you to expand into new markets without the hassle of sourcing, setting up and paying exorbitant rent for office space - Simply talk to us about your plans and we'll help you to hit the ground running!

Articles.NodeName: Servcorp Raises $225,000 for Disaster Victims
Articles.PageTitle: Servcorp Raises $225,000 for Disaster Victims - News | Servcorp
Articles.MetaKeyword: Servcorp Raises $225,000 for Disaster Victims,News, Servcorp
Articles.MetaDescription: Servcorp Raises $225,000 for Disaster Victims - Servcorp News
Articles.Title: Servcorp Raises $225,000 for Disaster Victims
Articles.Author: Servcorp
Articles.Summary: International virtual and serviced office provider Servcorp has raised $225,000 for victims of the natural disasters in Queensland.
Articles.A_Title: Servcorp Raises $225,000 for Disaster Victims
Articles.A_Content:
International virtual and serviced office provider Servcorp has raised $225,000 for victims of the natural disasters in Queensland.

Servcorp Executive Director Taine Moufarrige said the ASX-listed, Sydney-based company received more than $100,000 in donations from its clients and staff from throughout the world, including Japan and South East Asia, to the Premier's Disaster Relief Appeal.

“We decided to match the generous donations from our clients and our staff from all over the globe so we were able to raise a total of $225,000 for the appeal,” Mr Moufarrige said.

“With so many Queenslanders badly affected by first the floods and now Tropical Cyclone Yasi we felt an obligation to do what we can.”

Servcorp also offered many Brisbane businesses affected by last month's floods free phone call diversion and message handling services.

Companies which took advantage of Servcorp's wide range of services included EMC Global, Clayton UTZ, the National Seniors Association, Flooddiscounts.com.au and Riparian Plaza Building Management.

“Putting our global IT infrastructure into action, we were able to provide affected businesses in the Brisbane area with a complimentary phone line if requested,” Mr Moufarrige said. “Our teams in the Reserve Bank Building in Hobart and Melbourne Docklands managed calls for these affected businesses.”

Servcorp is the world's finest provider of 5 Star office solutions, and the international market leader in superior IT and communications infrastructure.

Articles.NodeName: Servcorps Investment in IT Infrastructure Pays Off
Articles.PageTitle: Servcorp’s Investment in IT Infrastructure Pays Off - News | Servcorp
Articles.MetaKeyword: Servcorp’s Investment in IT Infrastructure Pays Off,News, Servcorp
Articles.MetaDescription: Servcorp’s Investment in IT Infrastructure Pays Off - Servcorp News
Articles.Title: Servcorp's Investment in IT Infrastructure Pays Off
Articles.Author: Servcorp
Articles.Summary: Servcorp, the world's foremost provider of Serviced and Virtual offices, has become an IT innovator to stay ahead of its competitors and is seeing the benefits of a $50 million investment into a worldwide converged IP network.
Articles.A_Title: Servcorp's Investment in IT Infrastructure Pays Off
Articles.A_Content:
Servcorp, the world's foremost provider of Serviced and Virtual offices, has become an IT innovator to stay ahead of its competitors and is seeing the benefits of a $50 million investment into a worldwide converged IP network.

Many serviced office and managed workspace providers cut corners on costs when providing technology solutions. Their margin is a higher priority than their service. This means their clients ultimately suffer down time and data loss and communications issues. Servcorp Chief Information Office Marcus Moufarrige said the company's dedication to ensuring it had robust data and communications infrastructure had already paid dividends.

“Servcorp's dedication and an investment of $50 million into our worldwide converged IP network has delivered our clients 99.99 per cent up time across the globe,” Mr Moufarrige said:

“Servcorp have made an ongoing commitment to provide the highest levels of voice and data connectivity for our clients.”

Mr Moufarrige said a major difference from a technological perspective between Servcorp and its competitors was its decision to invest in a VoIP platform ten years ago, creating the cornerstone for an interconnected communications network.

“Having a reliable robust technology platform with multiple redundancies is critical to ensure our clients can run their businesses smoothly. It doesn't matter if they are in one of our office locations or accessing their Servcorp online account anywhere, anytime,” he said. “Our new iPhone applications just extend that flexibility and capability”

He said a further indicator of Servcorp's unparalleled service was depicted earlier this year when Thailand fell victim to political unrest which led to havoc along one of Bangkok's prime business districts.

“The Servcorp building was on fire, meaning that clients had to leave the premises and stop working,” Mr Moufarrige said.

“The site was inaccessible to clients for a significant amount of time and the challenge which ensued was for clients wanting to maintain the operation of their business without onsite availability.

“This problem was resolved utilising Servcorp's communications infrastructure to remotely log onto the system and divert all the calls to Singapore. All the calls of clients were being answered as if the business was open for operation.

“Due to our technology which enabled the redirection of calls to Singapore and we actually flew a receptionist there so that she could handle calls in Thai. Our clients enjoyed the benefit of being in operation while the rest of Bangkok in dissarray.”

Mr Moufarrige said Servcorp has also made a commitment to provide fast internet connections within all locations by purchasing the tier one level of service.

“Our rule of thumb is to always use a tier one provider because it mitigates a fair bit of that risk and we know that anywhere in the world, we get the best performance out of that country,” he said.

Articles.PageTitle: Introducing Servcorp’s newest Fukuoka location! - News | Servcorp
Articles.MetaKeyword: Introducing Servcorp’s newest Fukuoka location!,News, Servcorp
Articles.MetaDescription: Introducing Servcorp’s newest Fukuoka location! - Servcorp News
Articles.Title: Introducing Servcorp's newest Fukuoka location
Articles.Author: Servcorp
Articles.Summary: Servcorp introduces its second Fukuoka location this month as it opens in the impressive NOF Hakata Ekimae Building! Open from Tuesday 21st September, Servcorp offers businesses a prime location in the heart of Hakata-Ku, one of Fukuoka's main wards and home to the city's chief transport hub Hakata Station.
Articles.A_Title: Introducing Servcorp's newest Fukuoka location!
Articles.A_Content:
Servcorp introduces its second Fukuoka location this month as it opens in the impressive NOF Hakata Ekimae Building! Open from Tuesday 21st September, Servcorp offers businesses a prime location in the heart of Hakata-Ku, one of Fukuoka's main wards and home to the city's chief transport hub Hakata Station.

The city of Fukuoka is seen as the gateway to other major Asian cities as well as one of Japan's major business and commercial hubs. Fukuoka is located just one hour away from Seoul, one-and-a-half hours from Shanghai, and two-and-a-half hours from Hong Kong. It also provides the country's easiest access to Fukuoka Airport, with only five minutes commute to the city's center! This vibrant city is celebrated as Japan's IT capital, and as a result an ideal setting for Servcorp's industry leading IT and communications infrastructure. Servcorp's clients now have access to a wide range of industries, and businesses complemented by a superior IT and communications infrastructure and a vast global network of premium Executive Suites and Virtual Offices.

“At Servcorp we're proud to announce the launch of our brand new Fukuoka location! The landmark NOF Hakata Ekimae Building is our second location in Fukuoka which is offers a prime setting, perfectly situated in front of Hakata Station - the main station which offers convenient bullet train access to all of Japan's major cities. Our new NOF Hakata Ekimae floor is equipped with the same high quality fit-outs and standards of service for which Servcorp is renowned. This location allows clients to run their business within Fukuoka's major Hakata ward with the world's best in Executive Suites and Virtual Offices. NOF Hakata Ekimae Building is the perfect platform for businesses to expand; it's simply the best business address in Fukuoka!” Olga Vlietstra, General Manager – Japan commented.

Japan is the world's largest economy and a focal point for business and commerce in Asia. Servcorp is an established name in Japan, offering more than 20 locations across the country, providing Executive Suites and Virtual Office products in all major Japanese cities; Tokyo, Yokohama, Nagoya, Osaka and Fukuoka.

Level 2 NOF Hakata Ekimae Building
1-15-20 Hakata-Ekimae, Hakata-ku
Fukuoka 812-0011 Japan

Articles.Summary: Servcorp's 21st Japanese location has now opened in Osaka, one of the world's leading cities! The landmark Shinsaibashi Plaza Building Shinkan is nestled in the heart of Osaka's affluent Shinsaibashi district, right along Osaka's most vibrant boulevard, Midousuji.
Articles.A_Title: Servcorp opens third location in Osaka
Articles.A_Content:
Servcorp's 21st Japanese location has now opened in Osaka, one of the world's leading cities! The landmark Shinsaibashi Plaza Building Shinkan is nestled in the heart of Osaka's affluent Shinsaibashi district, right along Osaka's most vibrant boulevard, Midousuji. Open from Monday 13th September, this premium location offers the world's finest Executive Suites and Virtual Offices and a platform to do business in one of Japan's largest cities and metropolitan areas.

Servcorp's clients now have access to a third prestigious location in Osaka, a gateway city of Japan which serves as a key center for international trade and commerce within Asia and the world. Osaka's famous Mecca for luxury brand shopping, Shinsaibashi is also a major commercial and business hub of the city. Several large companies and businesses operate out of the Shinsaibashi district and Chuo ward, which is also home to many foreign consulates located within the city.

Olga Vlietstra, General Manager – Japan commented: “The fabulous Shinsaibashi Plaza Building Shinkan is an exciting addition to our growing portfolio of premium locations in Japan! We're now in the exclusive Shinsaibashi district in the area's most prestigious retail precinct. We are close to all key means of transport, the very best luxury shopping Osaka has to offer, and a wide range of dining options located around the building. The impressive Shinsaibashi Plaza Building Shinkan is truly Shinsaibashi's most exclusive address for any business!”

Level 4 Shinsaibashi Plaza Building Shinkan
3-12-21 Minami-Senba Chuo-ku
Osaka 542-0081 Japan

Articles.NodeName: Servcorp opens first Yokohama location!
Articles.PageTitle: Servcorp opens first Yokohama location! - News | Servcorp

Articles.Title: Servcorp have opened their first Yokohama location
Articles.Author: Servcorp
Articles.Summary: Servcorp have opened their first Yokohama location in the heart of the city's new Minato Mirai 21 district, where the city's key commercial and business activity takes place.
Articles.A_Title: Servcorp opens first Yokohama location!
Articles.A_Content:
Servcorp have opened their first Yokohama location in the heart of the city's new Minato Mirai 21 district, where the city's key commercial and business activity takes place. Open from August 16th, 2010 in Yokohama's newest building, the impressive TOC Minato Mirai Building, is where Servcorp will now offer premium Serviced and Virtual offices to businesses based in Yokohama. TOC Minato Mirai is ideally located at the exit of Sakuragi-cho station and presents an innovative platform to businesses that are looking to base themselves away from the busy Tokyo scene, yet still be less than 25 minutes from the Japanese capital.

An international harbour city with a beautiful skyline, Yokohama is Japan's second largest city with a population of 3.6 million, and part of the ‘commercial hub' of the greater Tokyo area. The city's vibrant commercial and cultural center-point, the Minato Mirai 21 district, which means “harbor of the future”,　is nestled in the heart of Yokohama. It is famous for its futuristic high-rise buildings and its innovative cultural attractions.

“TOC Minato Mirai is the best address for businesses in Yokohama! This premium location affords clients and potential clients with Servcorp's fully converged IT and Communications infrastructure which can elevate any business to get ahead and succeed, as we enable them to focus on their core business, while Servcorp takes care of the rest. TOC Minato Mirai is easily the most impressive and ideal address for any business looking to have a base in the heart of Yokohama's modern and exciting Minato Mirai 21 district. The views over the harbor are stunning.　We're very proud to add TOC Minato Mirai as Servcorp's latest location in Japan! Olga Vlietstra, General Manager - Japan.

Servcorp's new TOC Minato Mirai Building is conveniently positioned in the centre of this exciting area. This location presents sweeping views of the Yokohama and Minato Mira 21 skylines, whilst overlooking the Bay Bridge and Pacific Ocean and is just a one minute walk from Sakuragi-cho Station, modern retail, dining and hotel options.

Level 10 TOC Minato-Mirai
1-1-7 Sakuragi-cho Naka-ku
Yokohama Kanagawa 231-0062 Japan

Articles.Author: Servcorp
Articles.Summary: Servcorp are now pressing full steam ahead with its global expansion, and have now opened their first location in Lebanon. The stunning Beirut Souks Louis Vuitton Building, one of the Middle East's most exciting new locations, is nestled in the vibrant heart of the newly developed financial, commercial and administrative hub of Lebanon.
Articles.A_Title: Servcorp brings global expansion to Lebanon's impressive Beirut Souks!
Articles.A_Content:
Servcorp are now pressing full steam ahead with its global expansion, and have now opened their first location in Lebanon. The stunning Beirut Souks Louis Vuitton Building, one of the Middle East's most exciting new locations, is nestled in the vibrant heart of the newly developed financial, commercial and administrative hub of Lebanon.

Servcorp's seventh location in the Middle East, the newly restored Beirut Souks opened in October 2009, and began as an ambitious project undertaken by international development giant Solidere. The aim was to establish Beirut as an international and regional hub for commerce and a world class cultural destination, ultimately attracting international businesses, investors, tourists and shoppers alike.

Barry Barakat – General Manager, Lebanon has commented: “We're very proud to offer our clients The Beirut Souks Louis Vuitton Building is the premier location in Beirut. Lebanon is gaining momentum with the rest of the Middle East, so this is the perfect time to introduce Servcorp as the world's finest provider of Serviced and Virtual Offices into this emerging new market!”

Servcorp's new level 2 floor offers clients with benchmark setting IT and communications infrastructure and premium 5 star service. International companies, foreign embassies and official buildings such as the Lebanon Parliament, Prime Minister's offices, key ministries and public agencies, and the Municipality of Beirut. It is a world class development of nearly 200 luxury stores, office and lifestyle space.

Suite 2029 Level 2
Beirut Souks Louis Vuitton Building
Allenby Street Downtown Beirut
Beirut Lebanon

Servcorp's latest offering is the 20th floor of the stunning Terminus 200 tower, one of Atlanta's most prominent business addresses. Servcorp now offers premium Executive Suites and Virtual Suites in the historic heart of Atlanta's affluent commercial district of Buckhead.
Articles.A_Title: Servcorp continues aggressive US expansion
Articles.A_Content:
Servcorp has continued an aggressive global expansion opening a third US location in Atlanta, Georgia. Servcorp's latest offering is the 20th floor of the stunning Terminus 200 tower, one of Atlanta's most prominent business addresses. Servcorp now offers premium Executive Suites and Virtual Suites in the historic heart of Atlanta's affluent commercial district of Buckhead.

The newly built Terminus precinct, offers the ideal combination of living, working and leisure spaces in the heart of vibrant Buckhead. This district exudes a premium feel as the internationally renowned home of highest concentration of luxury boutiques and high-end retail stores in the United States.

Jennifer Goodwyn, General Manager - US commented: “We're now in our second US city! Atlanta is one of the fastest growing cities of the US, which has also emerged as a top international business city. We're excited to be in a city which is the international headquarters for some of the world's largest corporations. We're giving our clients more avenues to make their business a success in the US, and further establishing ourselves as the best in the business!”

Servcorp's conveniently located Terminus 200 location is situated close to all key strategic points within the city, and is just a few minutes from Downtown Atlanta, the city's largest traditional CBD, and Midtown Atlanta a dynamic business district of Atlanta. Servcorp's 20th floor at Terminus 200 offers the finest Atlanta Executive Suites and Atlanta Virtual Offices with sweeping views of Atlanta's iconic Piedmont Park, and the Buckhead and Midtown skylines.

3333 Piedmont Road
Suite 2050 20th floor
Atlanta GA 30305
USA

Articles.NodeName: Servcorp brings expansion back home, opening in Greater Western Sydney
Articles.PageTitle: Servcorp brings expansion back home, opening in Greater Western Sydney! - News | Servcorp
Articles.MetaKeyword: Servcorp brings expansion back home, opening in Greater Western Sydney!,News, Sercorp

Articles.Title: Servcorp brings expansion back home, opening in Greater Western Sydney
Articles.Author: Servcorp
Articles.Summary: Come July, Servcorp will bring its expansion back home opening in Parramatta, the heart of Greater Western Sydney.
Articles.A_Title: Servcorp brings expansion back home, opening in Greater Western Sydney
Articles.A_Content:
Come July, Servcorp will bring its expansion back home opening in Parramatta, the heart of Greater Western Sydney. Servcorp will be located in the premier Octagon building situated on Parramatta's iconic George Street. This will be the first of four new Australian locations due to open in 2010. Parramatta, Australia's sixth largest central business district and one of the fastest growing regional economies (also known as Sydney's second CBD) is a great location for business.

Located only 25 minutes west of the CBD, Parramatta is considered to be the business hub of Western Sydney. Servcorp's new Octagon building location will provide businesses based in Greater Western Sydney with an A-grade office environment without the city commute. Numerous private businesses have chosen Parramatta as a base for their business, and Servcorp's presence in the area will give businesses an opportunity for further growth, in this key area of commerce and business in Sydney.

Susie Martin, Servcorp General Manager Australia and New Zealand commented “We are really looking forward to opening our first location in Parramatta, a major business and commercial centre of Sydney! Servcorp's presence in Parramatta will open exciting new opportunities for businesses within the Greater Western Sydney region, where we will be able to provide our IT and communications infrastructure, premium services and facilities to businesses wanting to set up a base in this part of Sydney.”

Servcorp's new Octagon building location is easily accessible by road, rail and RiverCat with over 50 thousand people travelling through Parramatta daily. Parramatta's Rail and bus transport Interchange, a major transport hub in Western Sydney, is just 10 minutes walk from the Octagon building, while the Rivercat Terminal is a short five minute stroll.

Suite F Level 1 Octagon
110 George Street
Parramatta NSW 2150
Australia

Articles.NodeName: Servcorp opens floor in Sydney’s vibrant Bondi Junction
Articles.PageTitle: Servcorp opens floor in Sydney’s vibrant Bondi Junction - News | Servcorp

Articles.Title: ﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿Servcorp opens floor in Sydney's vibrant Bondi Junction
Articles.Author: Servcorp
Articles.Summary: From July 2010, Servcorp will open their eighth Sydney location, Tower Two Westfield Bondi Junction in the heart of Sydney's vibrant eastern suburb of Bondi Junction.
Articles.A_Title: Servcorp opens floor in Sydney's vibrant Bondi Junction
Articles.A_Content:
From July 2010, Servcorp will open their eighth Sydney location, Tower Two Westfield Bondi Junction in the heart of Sydney's vibrant eastern suburb of Bondi Junction. A unique location situated just five kilometres from Sydney's central business district, provides the ideal setting for businesses looking to base their business away from the hustle and bustle of Sydney's fast-paced CBD.

Servcorp's new presence in Sydney's east will offer exceptional opportunities for businesses, situated in the centre of Bondi Junction which is largely dominated by commercial complexes such Westfield Group's global flagship shopping centre, Westfield Bondi Junction, home to high-end luxury stores, leading retail shops and restaurants. The Westfield Bondi Junction precinct which includes Servcorp's Tower Two Westfield Bondi Junction, is owned by Westfield Group, the world's largest retail property group.

Servcorp's new Bondi Junction location will be directly above Westfield Bondi Junction Shopping Centre, and conveniently located opposite Bondi Junction railway station, providing easy transport access into Sydney's central business district with a bus interchange located at ground level. Tower Two Westfield Bondi Junction is a short 10 minute drive into Sydney's central business district.

Susie Martin, Servcorp General Manager Australia and New Zealand commented “Servcorp's Level 22 floor in Tower Two Westfield Bondi Junction further establishes Servcorp's reputation for providing the best office locations all over the world. Tower Two Westfield Bondi Junction will enable businesses large or small, with a global network of serviced and virtual offices and an IT and communications infrastructure which is second to none! Our 22nd floor boasts some of the most spectacular panoramic views of Sydney's iconic harbour, the Pacific Ocean, the picturesque eastern suburbs and Sydney's beaches.”

Suite 2201 Level 22 Tower Two Westfield Bondi Junction
101 Grafton Street
Bondi Junction NSW 2022
Australia

Articles.A_Content:
Servcorp has opened the doors to the latest location in the premier Hong Kong Club Building. Servcorp's first class standards of service, IT and communications infrastructure are a perfect fit to this iconic Hong Kong location. As a previously famous members-only club, The Hong Kong Club Building remains a historic symbol of the decadent British colonial past, and has been re-designed and refurbished by the celebrated Australian architect Harry Seidler.

Nestled in the exclusive heart of Hong Kong's financial and business district, The Hong Kong Club Building boasts spectacular harbour and city views as well as unrivalled proximity to Hong Kong Central's dynamic shopping, hotel and restaurants and just a stroll from the MTR Central Station. On the level 9 Servcorp floor, clients will enjoy service at an even higher level with a smaller number of exclusive Serviced Offices and expansive Virtual Office facilities and infrastructure.

Wilma Wu, Servcorp General Manager of Hong Kong has commented: “The Hong Kong Club Building is an exquisite location and the ideal choice for Servcorp! The Hong Kong Club Building is one of the most prestigious city centre addresses for any business, situated just opposite the Legislative Council of Hong Kong and the iconic Chater Garden! The entire team is very excited about our continued expansion and commitment to offer the very best serviced and virtual offices in Hong Kong.”

Unit 901 Level 9
The Hong Kong Club Building
3A Chater Road
Central Hong Kong China

Articles.NodeName: Servcorp marches onto second Chicago location
Articles.PageTitle: Servcorp marches onto second Chicago location! - News | Servcorp
Articles.MetaKeyword: Servcorp marches onto second Chicago location!,News, Sercorp
Articles.MetaDescription: Servcorp marches onto second Chicago location! - Servcorp News
Articles.Title: Servcorp marches onto second Chicago location
Articles.Author: Servcorp
Articles.Summary: Servcorp are further progressing into the United States with the second location in three months! The newly built 300 North LaSalle is one of Chicago's tallest architectural icons and the Servcorp floor will provide premier Serviced and Virtual Offices.
Articles.A_Title: Servcorp marches onto second Chicago location
Articles.A_Content:
Servcorp are further progressing into the United States with the second location in three months! The newly built 300 North LaSalle is one of Chicago's tallest architectural icons and the Servcorp floor will provide premier Serviced and Virtual Offices. 

Situated between the vibrant Chicago River North neighborhood and the prestigious Chicago Loop precinct, 300 North LaSalle is the ideal location for business and lifestyle. Presenting sweeping views of the stunning Chicago River and skyline, a welcoming sunlit waterfront garden plaza and an impressive river frontage, 300 North LaSalle is an address for both emerging and established business leaders.

Jennifer Goodwyn Servcorp General Manager United States commented: “We're making great strides in our fast-paced US expansion! The new 300 North LaSalle floor will provide the best Serviced and Virtual Offices to a wide range of clients. We're really excited about offering Servcorp's powerful IT and communications solutions and world famous five star service to Chicago's River North neighborhood. We aim to give businesses of any sizes a platform to access Servcorp's vast global network!”

Surrounded by an impressive list of business and lifestyle amenities, 300 North LaSalle offers a nearby fitness centre, underground parking, in-house banking services and an array of boutique stores, restaraunts and hotels throughout the River North area. The convenient location also offers a walkway connection to Chicago Transit Authority (CTA) trains for access to both Chicago airports and every corner of the city.

300 North LaSalle Street
Suite 4925 49th floor
Chicago IL 60654
USA

Articles.NodeName: Servcorp daringly enters the US market
Articles.PageTitle: Servcorp daringly enters the US market! - News | Servcorp
Articles.MetaKeyword: Servcorp daringly enters the US market!,News, Sercorp
Articles.MetaDescription: Servcorp daringly enters the US market! - Servcorp News
Articles.Title: Servcorp daringly enters the US market
Articles.Author: Servcorp
Articles.Summary: Servcorp has entered the US market for the first time ever! The first U.S location is in the much sought after 155 North Wacker building, in the famous 'Chicago Loop', the city's central business district.
Articles.A_Title: Servcorp daringly enters the US market
Articles.A_Content:
Servcorp has entered the US market for the first time ever! The first U.S location is in the much sought after 155 North Wacker building, in the famous ‘Chicago Loop', the city's central business district. A key strategic city for Servcorp and the third largest city in the US, Chicago is the world's 26th largest metropolitan area and a major global centre for international business and finance. Servcorp's expansion into the US market will also support the US in these times of economic recovery, as it hires and invests in American team members.

155 North Wacker is one of Chicago's newest skyscrapers, built by Goettsch Partners and The John Buck Company, an award winning team renowned for some of the Loop's most iconic buildings. Servcorp's 42nd floor features a stunning floor-to-ceiling glass façade, and spectacular views of Lake Michigan and the Chicago skyline.

Jennifer Goodwyn, General Manager US commented: “We've made our grand entry into the US market with our first Servcorp location at 155 North Wacker! I'm confident we'll establish our name as the best serviced and virtual office provider in this market, as we introduce our unrivalled IT and communications infrastructure, and giving businesses large or small, a vast global network of offices! We enable clients to take their business to the international arena in an efficient and effective manner.”

Located close to major banks, businesses, finance and lifestyle amenities, 155 North Wacker is situated in an elite neighbourhood of high-end retail, boutique hotels and fine dining. Servcorp's 155 North Wacker location conveniently lies on the northeast corner of North Wacker Drive and Randolph Street, just minutes from Chicago Transit Authority (CTA) trains, Metra, subway and bus transport services.

155 North Wacker Drive
42nd Floor
Chicago, IL 60606
USA

Articles.NodeName: Servcorp brings Virtual Offices to Kowloon, Hong Kong
Articles.PageTitle: Servcorp brings Virtual Offices to Kowloon, Hong Kong! - News | Servcorp
Articles.MetaKeyword: Servcorp brings Virtual Offices to Kowloon, Hong Kong!,News, Sercorp
Articles.MetaDescription: Servcorp brings Virtual Offices to Kowloon, Hong Kong! - Servcorp News
Articles.Title: Servcorp brings Virtual Offices to Kowloon, Hong Kong
Articles.Author: Servcorp
Articles.Summary: Servcorp, the world's finest provider of Serviced and Virtual Offices is coming to Kowloon! Opening in April, Servcorp will be located at the landmark One Peking building, in the heart of the Tsimshatsui district of Kowloon, a major area for business and commerce situated on mainland China.
Articles.A_Title: Servcorp brings Virtual Offices to Kowloon, Hong Kong
Articles.A_Content:
Servcorp, the world's finest provider of Serviced and Virtual Offices is coming to Kowloon! Opening in April, Servcorp will be located at the landmark One Peking building, in the heart of the Tsimshatsui district of Kowloon, a major area for business and commerce situated on mainland China. Servcorp will be the first ever provider of virtual office packages in Hong Kong.

One Peking sets a benchmark in architecture and style, renowned for its unique sail-like design. Featuring stunning panoramic views of Victoria Harbour and the city skyline, One Peking is a key part of the Tsimshatsui precinct. Servcorp's level 12, floor will provide businesses in Kowloon with Servcorp's inimitable IT and Communications infrastructure, and access to a large and rapidly growing global network of Serviced and Virtual Office locations.

“We are very excited about introducing virtual office services in Kowloon for the first time ever! The Servcorp Virtual Office® will allow clients to run their business from home or any other location, without the associated overhead costs of having a physical office. Our rapidly growing network will also provide businesses in this market with seamless services and efficient facilities to make their business a success”. Wilma Wu, General Manager Hong Kong has commented.

Servcorp's One Peking location is also home to high-end boutique stores and fine dining options on the top floors of the building. One Peking is just five minutes walk from convenient transport access via Tsimshatsui MTR Station and China Ferry Terminal offering frequent services to Macau, Zhuhai, Dougguan, Shekou Shenzhen and up to 15 destinations around the Macau region and Pearl River Delta cities. Victoria Harbour just is minutes away via the world famous Star Ferry, available from the Star Ferry terminal, just minutes walking distance to One Peking.

One Peking is 5 minutes taxi ride to the Kowloon Airport Express Station, and only 20 minutes by train to the HK International Airport; Servcorp clients can also take the Direct Bus Services from Kowloon to Shenzhen Airport.

Unit 1202, Level 12,
1 Peking Road,
Tsimshatsui, Kowloon
Hong Kong, China

Articles.NodeName: Servcorp opens in Tokyo’s famous skyscraper district
Articles.PageTitle: Servcorp opens in Tokyo’s famous skyscraper district! - News | Servcorp
Articles.MetaKeyword: Servcorp opens in Tokyo’s famous skyscraper district!,News, Sercorp
Articles.MetaDescription: Servcorp opens in Tokyo’s famous skyscraper district! - Servcorp News
Articles.Title: Servcorp opens in Tokyo's famous skyscraper district
Articles.Author: Servcorp
Articles.Summary: Servcorp have opened their 14th location in Tokyo, within the city's famous Shinjuku sky scraper district! Opening March 1st 2010, Servcorp's Nittochi Nishi-Shinjuku Building location is in the large business, commercial and entertainment centre of Shinjuku, and within walking distance to the world's busiest train station complex Shinjuku Station, handling more than two million passengers every day.
Articles.A_Title: Servcorp opens in Tokyo's famous skyscraper district
Articles.A_Content:
Nittochi Nishi-Shinjuku Building
Level 8
6-10-1 Nishi-Shinjuku, Shinjuku-ku
Tokyo 160-0023 Japan

Servcorp have opened their 14th location in Tokyo, within the city's famous Shinjuku sky scraper district! Opening March 1st 2010, Servcorp's Nittochi Nishi-Shinjuku Building location is in the large business, commercial and entertainment centre of Shinjuku, and within walking distance to the world's busiest train station complex Shinjuku Station, handling more than two million passengers every day.

Nittochi Nishi-Shinjuku Building, Servcorp's newest location in Japan, is part of a major commercial hub and administration centre for the Government of Tokyo, and home to the Tokyo Metropolitan Government Building. This new location will give businesses related to the administration and government sector an ideal location to base their business. This bustling business and commercial hub is also within minutes walking distance to Shinjuku's largest shopping malls Odakyu and Keio.

Olga Vlietstra General Manager Japan has commented: “We're proud to announce Servcorp's fantastic new location Nittochi Nishi-Shinjuku Building! This building has a striking blue-glass façade, complimented with magnificent views of Shinjuku City from our level 8 floor. It's the perfect location to establish your corporate presence. Servcorp is now in all the prime areas of Tokyo, giving our clients wider options to base their business large or small”.

As one of Tokyo's most widely accessible locations, Nittochi Nishi-Shinjuku Building is just minutes from JR, Subway and Bus Transport from Shinjuku Station, and 45 minutes by bus from Shinjuku Station to Haneda Airport.

Articles.NodeName: Servcorp opens for business in Kuwait

Articles.MetaDescription: Servcorp opens for business in Kuwait! - Servcorp News
Articles.Title: Servcorp opens for business in Kuwait
Articles.Author: Servcorp
Articles.Summary: Servcorp is stepping into the Kuwait market for the first time ever! From February 14, Servcorp will be open at the landmark Sahab Tower building, located in the centre of Kuwait City's main business and commercial district.
Articles.A_Title: Servcorp opens for business in Kuwait
Articles.A_Content:
Servcorp is stepping into the Kuwait market for the first time ever! From February 14, Servcorp will be open at the landmark Sahab Tower building, located in the centre of Kuwait City's main business and commercial district. As the sixth location in the Middle East, Kuwait City will increase Servcorp's growing presence as the finest provider of Serviced and Virtual Office packages in the region.

A key strategic city in the region, Kuwait City is within a short distance to major Middle Eastern cities. A recent wave of interest from foreign businesses in Kuwait has catapulted Kuwait to a major centre point for business and commerce in the region. Servcorp's Sahab Tower location will provide the ideal platform for foreign and local companies to easily run their business in Kuwait City.

Barry Barakat General Manager Kuwait has commented: “This is the best time for Servcorp to be entering Kuwait in our new Sahab Tower location. Not only are we giving local businesses the opportunity to conduct their business with first-class services, IT infrastructure and facilities in Kuwait and around our network, we are also enabling international companies to operate from the best business location in Kuwait City.

Servcorp's 18th level floor features panoramic views of the city, is centrally located and directly above Salhia Commercial Complex, Kuwait's premier shopping destination in Safat, Kuwait City's downtown area.

Articles.NodeName: Servcorp expands in Tokyo and Fukuoka
Articles.PageTitle: Servcorp expands in Tokyo and Fukuoka - News | Servcorp
Articles.MetaKeyword: Servcorp expands in Tokyo and Fukuoka,News, Sercorp
Articles.MetaDescription: Servcorp expands in Tokyo and Fukuoka - Servcorp News
Articles.Title: Servcorp expands in Tokyo and Fukuoka
Articles.Author: Servcorp
Articles.Summary: Servcorp, International provider of premium Serviced Office and Virtual Office solutions, are set to open two new locations in Japan; Marunouchi Trust Tower, Tokyo and Da Vinci Fukuoka Tenjin, Fukuoka.
Articles.A_Title: Servcorp expands in Tokyo and Fukuoka
Articles.A_Content:
Servcorp, International provider of premium Serviced Office and Virtual Office solutions, are set to open two new locations in Japan; Marunouchi Trust Tower, Tokyo and Da Vinci Fukuoka Tenjin, Fukuoka.

Following a recent announcement of plans for further global expansion, Servcorp will add to its network of prestigious locations in Japan. Servcorp offers high-quality fit-outs, a superior standard of service and provides businesses with the latest in IT and communications solutions.

Opening December 2009, Marunouchi Trust Tower-Main is located in "Marunouchi 1-chome", Japan's core business district above Tokyo's triple access station. This location will become Servcorp's flagship location in Japan; giving businesses convenient access to many major cities throughout Japan via Otemachi and Nihonbashi Stations. Servcorp will join major international companies such as Mitsubishi Group, Toyota, KPMG and Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu all based within the iconic Marunouchi Precinct.

Opening January 2010, the Da Vinci Fukuoka Tenjin Building will be Servcorp's first location in Fukuoka City, situated within Kyushu's largest commercial and business district; Tenjin. Seen as the gateway to other major Asian cities, Fukuoka is one hour to Seoul, one-and-a-half hours to Shanghai, and two-and-a-half hours to Hong Kong. Also known as Japan's IT industry capital, Fukuoka is the ideal setting for Servcorp's industry leading IT and communications infrastructure. This will enable a wide range of industries and businesses with efficient means of conducting their business activities.

Olga Vlietstra, General Manager Japan at Servcorp has commented: “We're looking forward to the launch of our flagship location; the Marunouchi Trust Tower-Main, and our first Fukuoka location, Da Vinci Fukuoka Tenjin. Servcorp's premium floors are equipped with the latest IT services Servcorp has to offer. In addition, we will provide our clients with the highly systematic infrastructure of an international organization, giving them the opportunity to utilize Servcorp's global network of offices, while focusing on their core business objectives.”

Servcorp is well established in Japan, the world's second largest economy, and a centre point of business activity in Asia. Our presence in Japan's four major cities; Tokyo, Osaka, Nagoya and now Fukuoka will give our clients the ideal platform for doing business in Asia, while connecting them with the rest of the world through our vast global network.

Articles.Author: Servcorp
Articles.Summary: Servcorp is excited to announce our newest location in the Middle East at Jameel Square in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia! Jameel Square is Servcorp's first location in Saudi Arabia and it will offer both Serviced Offices and Virtual Office packages for local and international businesses.
Articles.A_Title: Servcorp's premier location in Saudi Arabia
Articles.A_Content:
Servcorp is excited to announce our newest location in the Middle East at Jameel Square in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia! Jameel Square is Servcorp's first location in Saudi Arabia and it will offer both Serviced Offices and Virtual Office packages for local and international businesses. This prime landmark location will provide the highest Servcorp standards of fit-out and service along with leading IT and communications to help clients work more effectively.

Jameel Square is at the heart of the Jeddah's business district on the corner of Tahlia and Al Andalus Streets. The building is less than 30 mins taxi drive from King Abdulaziz International Airport and boasts more than 8,000sqm of retail and commercial space occupied by major domestic and international corporations. From modern shopping to sophisticated Servcorp offices, everything about this location is impressive!

The Servcorp floor has magnificent views of the city and the Red Sea, is spaciously laid out and provides easy access to Jeddah's premier main streets, upmarket shopping malls and ample on-site parking.

Articles.NodeName: Servcorp opens flagship location in London
Articles.PageTitle: Servcorp opens flagship location in London  - News | Servcorp
